content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Real-time and on-demand scanning Cloud Email and Collaboration Protection applies real-time and on-demand (manual) scanning to Data Loss Prevention policies in the same way as to Advance Threat Protection policies.
